official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Angeles and San Bernardino National Forests as the "Sheep Mountain Wilderness.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-357) Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to review the suitability as wilderness of the 52,000-acre "Sheep Mountain Wilderness" in the Angeles and San Bernardino National Forests, California. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Angeles and San Bernardino National Forests as the "Sheep Mountain Wilderness.
